name: Moving In
description:
Moving In is about relaxing in a cozy environment. You decorate the house you are moving in. There is no goal, no timer, no challenges. It is all about having a relaxing experience. Create the house you desire. You will be able to pick up, rotate, interact and throw all the props. Most of the house utilities are interactable.



  • Sandbox
  • Puzzles
  • Interactive Physics Objects
  • Move&Rotate Objects
  • Lock Objects in Place
  • Surface Snapping
  • Throw Objects
  • Cozy Houses
  • Chill Music
  • Lots of Stylized Furniture&Props
  • Save&Load System
  • Free Content Updates



Sandbox mode offers you a selection of houses and lots of furniture. Relax and decorate your dream house while listening to a curated chill lo-fi music playlist.



In this mode you need to match photo references to finish the puzzles. Each puzzle will give you a different set of photos which you will need to match by placing the object in correct spots.
